title: General Secretary of the Mongolian People's Party
text: The General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Mongolian People's Party () is the <a href="Party%20leader">leader</a> of the <a href="Mongolian%20People%27s%20Party">Mongolian People's Party</a> (previously the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party). With some exceptions, the office was synonymous with leaders of the <a href="Mongolian%20People%27s%20Republic">Mongolian People's Republic</a>. Throughout its history the office had four other names; Chairman, First Secretary, General Secretary.
